about_the_game:
Survive as long as you can until you reach the surface!

There are 6 planets to choose from.

Terra: The homeworld of the humans.
Algaeus: The lush moss planet that will make you sneeze a fountain.
Santos: The harsh desert planet void of nearly all life besides a few carnivorous sand worms, and pirate outposts hostile to any other humanoid tresspassers.
Oceania: A massive ocean planet where it's civilization exclusively lives underwater, rife with aquatic wildlife and a gated, oceanic tunnel-city network.
Hoth: A barren ice planet and home to a paamilitary corporation owned by a despot seeking to rule the galaxy with an iron fist.
Resh: A hellish magma gas giant mess of a planet uninhabitable to anyone seeking to colonize, or evade inner-galactic authorities. Mostly a resource planet at best.

With each planet, you must guide your drop pod through the asteroid belt and the planet's defense missiles and land on the surface, on-time to invade and conquer the planet.

_

This DLC is automatically bundled with JSC, however you can buy this standalone version individually here if you don't wish to buy the entire collection.
